issue.title: [CI] [Rust] New 1.40.0 nightly causing builds to fail
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So much for pinning the nightly version ... that doesn't work when there is a new major version of a nightly apparently.

Travis is now using:
```java

rustc 1.40.0-nightly (37538aa13 2019-09-25) 
```
Despite rust-toolchain containing:
```java

nightly-2019-07-30 
```
